left: Service Area: Borough + parts of Township (and minor in Caernarvon, Lancaster County).
Water Sources: Four groundwater wells; two storage tanks; booster pump station.
right: Fire Protection: ≈88 hydrants connected to the distribution system.
Quality: Meet all Federal, State, and County regulations.
